reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a short and very pleasant stay in sunny Cork and we were very happy to be back again in the Clarion! Everything was perfect.The lovely helpful receptionist was just one example of the friendly helpful staff throughout the hotel.
reviews.title: Wonderful short break

reviews.text: We had a lovely river-overlooking room as requested and similar to the one we had on our last visit .Our bed was extremely comfortable and we had a very good night's sleep.
reviews.title: Excellent all around

reviews.text: Dinner was very pleasant and again lovely friendly staff,The apple tart and icecream was just delicious. Breakfast was top quality and even though the restaurant was very busy the service was first rate.Some good fruit followed by excellent bacon,sausages and puddings along with good coffee.left us feeling well fed!
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, location & staff

reviews.text: We did not use the pool or spa but we have heard from friends that they are good.
reviews.title: Cant wait to return to clarion cork

reviews.text: Our visit to the Clarion was a welcome break and we look forward to returning in the not-too-distant future.No wonder this excellent hotel was booked out on the day we left.
reviews.title: Mixed Feelings

reviews.text: Quite a gem in a middle of town. Modern hotel (OK, why not plasmas?), attractive decor, Michelin-aspiring restaurant (to be honest - didn't eat in, was just told it is), nice looking bar (drinks and some thai/chinese food available), room was nice although I got one with poor view (overlooking some office building few meters away), free Wifi - everything the business traveller needs.
reviews.title: nice, modern, a bit expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Close to everything, taxis, shops, restaurants, you name it.
reviews.title: Full service hotel in the heart of Cork

reviews.text: Generally, a bit on expensive side, but worth.
reviews.title: Altogether Excellent!

reviews.text: We stayed only one night at the Clarion on our first day in Ireland and the hotel provided very comfortable accomodations. I would classify the Clarion as generally a good quality business hotel. There are a couple of restaurants next door on the river which were great for lunch on a sunny day. The only negative is the price for leisure travel.
reviews.title: Huge Room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing but praise for everything in The Clarion from cleanliness, quality of Hotel, great food and the staff are excellent. Nothing is too much bother
reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service

reviews.text: Stayed her on 28th February x 2 nights x 2 rooms, on the Dine and stay free offer. Arrived early on Sunday, one room was ready upon arrival, which we were not expecting. Lovely friendly staff on check-in and check-out. rooms very comfortable with view of the sea. Great Weather added to our stay. Kinsale is just a few miles away. Ate on both evenigs on our deal. Menu was very good and food presenation was excellent. Staff in restaurant were attentive and friendly. was third time staying in the last few years. only fault with hotel, it lacks athmosphere, although it was Sunday and monday and not very busy. restaurant was not cozy, quiet chilly during dinner, not inclined to linger over dinner. Will return. :)
reviews.title: Excellent Value

reviews.text: Very comfortable hotel. Just at the end of the strip near the bus terminal. Staff aren't that helpful but you don't really need to talk to them other than checking in. There is a pool, hot tub, sauna all available for your stay. Very relaxing. The rooms were really clean and nice. Extremely comfortable. Not a place to meet travellers but a great palce for a comfortable sleep. 80 Euro for a double room. We booked online before hand and got that deal.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: Great hotel, very modern comfy rooms, good bed. Restaurant is also excellent, centrally located, 5 minutes away from the centre. Internet connection free and fast. However, expensive parking in the underground car-park. I would stay again and happily recommend it.
reviews.title: Great hotel but expensive parking

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We a group of friends stayed in this hotel for one night. We were very impressed with the hotel, starting off I have to say the staff are excellent in reception, very friendly and imformative. The hotel is very central location and is a very clean hotel with great facilities.
reviews.title: Clarion is Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good points
reviews.title: One of my best hotels ever!

reviews.text: Stayed at the Clarion for 2 nights in March during a work trip. We had a special company rate of 100 euro's a night, so can't beat the price. The lobby is very large with ample seating. The rooms are decent size, with modern furniture (but old style TV). Bathroom was spacious and updated. My only real complaint is that the beds are hard. If you like that, then you'll love your nights sleep. But I was dying for an extra down comforter or something to soften it up.
reviews.title: Great location. Very clean & modern. But HARD beds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ate breakfast at the hotel which was fine. However buffet is the only option, no menu ordering. So if you like your eggs cutomized, you are out of luck. Didn't use the gym but walked by it, and it has lots of equipement, plus a pool.
reviews.title: The perfect hotel experience

reviews.text: The hotel also has a spa, which I unfortunately didn't get to use.
reviews.title: Average hotel, fairly expensive but Excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They were very helpful at checkout, and even printed our boarding passes for us. Found the staff very friendly.
reviews.title: Comfortable and Clean

reviews.text: Booked 3 nights as a city break, the rate was great especially considering the quality/location of the hotel.
reviews.title: Good Hotel but bedroom decor lets it down
